analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/3/0xafb079e22d23028c445c722fc17c08af1b4a1409.sol:
	Contract VirtualRealityOperationSystem has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/3/0xafb079e22d23028c445c722fc17c08af1b4a1409.sol#422-423)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

VirtualRealityOperationSystem.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0xafb079e22d23028c445c722fc17c08af1b4a1409.sol#406-408)
